ActCanada Student Financial Assistance Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Canada Student Financial Assistance Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the CANADA STUDENT FINANCIAL ASSISTANCE REGULATIONS in order to ensure that students continue to be eligible for the financial assistance they require in order to pursue their post-secondary education.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2013-0072 Publication Date: 2013-05-08
